channel.title: Wont let me play, plz help
channel.description:
ok when ever i click on that little link that says "run Moparscape" a black box appears and says: 'java' is not recodnized as a internal or external command, operable program or batch file
how do i fix that?

item.title: Wont let me play, plz help
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

download newer java. www.java.com jdk files.
